body_html: because the self.encoders dict is the same in all replicas, but each will have different modules (because they need to hold different parameters). So all replicas will try to use the modules from the first one, which will give you a GPU idx mismatch error

body: because the `self.encoders` dict is the same in all replicas, but each will have different modules (because they need to hold different parameters). So all replicas will try to use the modules from the first one, which will give you a GPU idx mismatch error
